CalendarScreen.title: Calendar
CalendarScreen.errorMessage:
We were unable to fetch your calendar.
You can try the fix calendar instructions in the setting page of this app.

SettingsScreen.title: Settings
SettingsScreen.TokenInstructionDescription: Go to Horarius website. In the upper right corner, click the little agenda icon and regenerate an iCal link. Then sign out and sign in again in this app.
